meta.description: Minimize the total fuel consumption for transporting goods using ships and planes.

sets.name: MODES
sets.description: Modes of transportation available for goods.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each mode in terms of containers.

params.name: fuel_usage
params.description: Fuel usage per trip for each mode.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each mode.

objective.name: min_total_fuel
objective.expr: sum(trips[m] * fuel_usage[m] for m in MODES)

constraints.name: min_containers
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 containers are transported.

constraints.name: max_plane_trips
constraints.description: At most 10 plane trips can be made.

constraints.name: min_ship_trips_ratio
constraints.description: At least 50% of the trips must be by ship.
